problems.text: A population of rabbits quadruples every 3 months. If there are 2 rabbits initially, how many after 12 months?
An investor deposits $1500 at 6% interest compounded annually. What will it be worth after 10 years?
A ball bounces to 7/10 of its previous height each time. Dropped from 5 meters, how high is the 9th bounce?
A tree grows 8% taller each year. If current height is 4 meters, what is height after 15 years?
A mold doubles every 2 days. If it starts at 1.5 grams, what is its weight on the 10th day?
A savings account deposits $800 annually, earning 7% compounded yearly. What is the value of the 15th deposit after 15 years?
